reviews.customers_say: Customers find this dress looks expensive and flatters curvy bodies by hugging the curves in all the right places.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Want to feel beautiful? Buy this dress.
items.body: Lovvvvvvve this dress!! It’s so comfortable and literally fits like a dream. It’s perfect for curvy girls with an hourglass figure. I got compliments all evening long wearing this. It definitely makes you feel good. The material is thick and stretchy giving you a perfect fit. The blue is a nice bold color that stands out. I would buy this dress in every color! Read more
items.author: Caitlyn Ellis

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars PERFECT PINK !!! AMAZING DRESS
items.body: bought this LAGSHIAN dress in Fluopink, size Medium, and I was pleasantly surprised. The one-shoulder design and the ruched waist create a very flattering silhouette that really enhances the figure. The fabric is soft, stretchy, and comfortable—it hugs the body nicely without feeling too tight, making it perfect for wearing through a long formal event. The color is vibrant and eye-catching, ideal if you want to stand out at a wedding, gala, or evening party. The stitching is well done, and the dress looks far more expensive than it is. The length is just right to wear with heels. Overall, it’s a gown that combines elegance with a modern, sexy touch. I definitely recommend this dress if you’re looking for something sophisticated that also makes a statement. Read more
items.author: Rana Becerra

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very cute and affordable!
items.body: Very nice! This dress came exactly as pictured, it has a lot of stretch to it, and it it well. I am 5'3, 185 and I ordered a size Large and it fit perfectly. I wore a kitten heel and it wasn't dragging the floor. Like other reviews you do have to keep pulling the shoulder piece down, but it wasn't bad. I would but this dress again in other colors. Definitely worth it for the price. Read more
items.author: samantha brooks

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful!
items.body: I’m 5’5” 160 lbs 36D. I wear an 8/10 typically in dresses. I ordered a medium and it fit nicely. The rouching covered up the tiny stomach bump I have which was awesome. The material feels thick and of nice quality. I loved the texture of it and the sheer part was semi-adjustable depending on how much you rouche the bodice. There were no tags that I noticed so I believe you could switch which shoulder you wanted it on as the front and back appeared exactly the same. I bought it for a fall wedding, but a week earlier found out it was going to be 86 degrees out, so I had to return and look at other cooler options. This dress was cool in the legs and obviously arms, but I was worried it would trap too much heat to be enjoyable at the wedding. This dress would be great for any formal event and looks amazing! Read more
items.author: whooke09

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars SO Comfortable!
items.body: SO comfortable!! Originally, I was kind of disappointed when I opened the package because the fabric looks cheap. I almost didn't even try it on because it was not at all what I expected (think stretchy tulle rather than nice chiffon), but I am so glad I did! It is seriously the most comfortable thing I own. Like better than my PJ's. Plus, once it's on, the fabric lays really nicely and looks pretty good. It doesn't seem to wrinkle, even when it is shoved in a bag for shipping and hugs the curves in all the right places :) I rarely write reviews, but I highly recommend this one!! Read more
items.author: Alicia P.

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful Dress
items.body: Loved my dress! Got it to wear to a wedding! Received several compliments! Fit right on my curves. Only thing I didn’t like was the sleeve kept rising when I moved my arm. Beautiful dress!! Ordered a XL Read more
items.author: Da’Kecia

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Cute......BUT.......
items.body: The dress is lovely and comfortable. However, the one shoulder part doesn't stay put. It rides up and exposes the stretchy band that is supposed to keep it in place and then you can see the armpit in the front and back. It really needs a quick sewing tack or something to keep it in place. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Classy classic look
items.body: Such a lovely dress. Styled in a way that makes it a classic. Fits like a glove. It is a little tricky keeping the one shoulder and front rouching on the top in place but wasn’t a game changer for me. Really enjoyed wearing it to our annual charity ball and I felt like a queen. Was a tad long but easy to adjust if needed. Read more
items.author: Cheryl J.

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Bodycon One Shoulder Formal Sleeveless Evening Ruched is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.
about_this_item:
Womens Maxi Dress Bodycon One Shoulder Formal Sleeveless Evening Ruched is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Bodycon One Shoulder Formal Sleeveless Evening Ruched is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Red, Winered, Pink, White, Beige, Blue, Purple, Royalblue, Rose, Black, Fluopink, Orange. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
